title:
Stainless Steel Refrigerator Shovel Ice Scraper Removal Deicing Tool Kitchen;
stainless stell and PP material; colors: blue, gray, pink; size: 17x4.5 cm;
descriptions:
**Introducing the Ultimate Kitchen Companion: The Stainless Steel Refrigerator Shovel Ice Scraper!**

Say goodbye to the hassle of defrosting with our sleek and durable Stainless Steel Refrigerator Shovel Ice Scraper, your new ally in keeping your freezer clean and efficient. Crafted with a combination of sturdy stainless steel and high-quality PP material, this ice removal tool is designed to stand the test of time.

**Elegant Design & Vivid Colors:**
Choose from three vibrant colors ‚Äì classic blue, modern gray, or playful pink ‚Äì to add a pop of personality to your kitchen gadget collection. Our ice scraper's size is a compact 17x4.5 cm, making it easy to handle and store.

**High-Quality Materials:**
With a blade forged from stainless steel and a comfortable PP handle, this tool is not only strong but also ergonomically designed for maximum efficiency and ease of use. This high-quality construction ensures longevity and persistent performance.

**Versatile Usage:**
Whether you're tackling a frosty freezer or cleaning up after a baking session, this tool is versatile enough to meet all your household needs. It's the perfect addition to any kitchen, providing a practical solution for those frosty challenges.

**Package Includes:**
Every order comes with 1 Fridge Ice Scraper, ready to take on the icy build-up in your refrigerator or any other deicing tasks around the home.

**Please Note:**
- There may be a slight measurement deviation of 1-5mm, but this won't affect the effectiveness of your ice scraper.
- While we strive to display the most accurate color possible, actual product color may vary due to differences in monitor settings and lighting conditions.

Don't let ice build-up slow you down! Grab your Stainless Steel Refrigerator Shovel Ice Scraper today and make defrosting effortless. Shop now and bring home the ultimate deicing tool that combines functionality with style!
